comments: Kettl was described as a “truly excellent professor,” and apparently has excellent speaking and presentation skills as well although some students did not appreciate his digressions in class. Some people also did not like the lectures, saying that they were “useless” because all the information was on the slide, but recitation was well appreciated. The course material seemed to be of interest to many: “A good overview of American politics for a beginner s that doesn’t discourage newcomers by presenting hard to follow topics.”  “Highly recommended to everyone!” raves one student.
